data.message: I have a problem with a page. The administrator deleted his account and made another account, and he forgot about me, I am editor. I want to delete the page and I can't, because I'm not the administrator. I also want to delete my role in the page, but I'm the only one there, so I can't. Please help me, Facebook team.

replies.message: Hi Purtuc. If the Page is unmanaged, you'll see Unofficial Page below the cover photo. You can then request to claim the Page and become the admin: http://bit.ly/2tDRpL8. However, if the Page is managed, you won't see the option to claim it. If this is the case, you can report the Page: http://bit.ly/2uQ7WeJ. -Jessica
